common_puns: Why don't witches wear panties? So they can grip the broom better!
I'm light as a feather, and I can see you're stiff as a board.
What do you call a ghost's favorite type of music? Soul music!
Why did the vampire break up with his girlfriend? She was too clingy!
What's a ghost's favorite type of candy? Boo-berry!
Why don't ghosts ever win at poker? Because they always fold!
What do you call a witch who lives at the beach? A sand-witch!
Why did the skeleton go to the party alone? Because he had no body to go with!
What's a vampire's favorite fruit? A blood orange!
Why don't zombies ever win at hide and seek? Because they always get caught!
halloween_pickup_lines: Are you a witch? Because you've put a spell on me!
Is your name Halloween? Because you're giving me goosebumps!
Are you a ghost? Because I can see right through you!
Is your name Dracula? Because you're sucking the life out of me!
Are you a pumpkin? Because you're making me feel all warm inside!
Is your name Casper? Because you're the friendliest ghost I've ever met!
Are you a werewolf? Because you're making me howl with desire!
Is your name Frankenstein? Because you're electrifying!
Are you a zombie? Because you're making me feel alive!
Is your name Medusa? Because you're turning me to stone!
